data.title: Peter T. Masterson obituary
data.meta_description: Bristol -    Peter T. Masterson, 70, of the Rhode Island Veterans Home in Bristol, died Thursday March 5, 2020 at the Veterans Home.  He was born in Providence.  Peter was a United States Army Veteran, serving as a Private First Class.  He was a truck driver for many years, before he retired.  His funeral service will be held Wednesday March 11, 2020 at 10:00 am in the Chapel of the Rhode Island Veterans Home, 480 Metacom Avenue, Bristol.  Military Honors following the service, at the entrance of the Veterans Home.  Burial will follow in the Rhode Island Veterans Memorial Cemetery, Exeter.  Relatives and friends are invited to attend.   Calling hours in the Chapel of the Rhode Island Veterans Home, on Wednesday March 11, 2020 from 9:30 am -10:00 am .  Arrangements by the SMITH FUNERAL and MEMORIAL SERVICES , 8 Schoolhouse Road, Warren.  www. wjsmithfh. com
data.text:
Bristol - Peter T. Masterson, 70, of the Rhode Island Veterans Home in Bristol, died Thursday March 5, 2020 at the Veterans Home.

He was born in Providence.

Peter was a United States Army Veteran, serving as a Private First Class.

He was a truck driver for many years, before he retired.

His funeral service will be held Wednesday March 11, 2020 at 10:00 am in the Chapel of the Rhode Island Veterans Home, 480 Metacom Avenue, Bristol.

Military Honors following the service, at the entrance of the Veterans Home.

Burial will follow in the Rhode Island Veterans Memorial Cemetery, Exeter.

Relatives and friends are invited to attend.

Calling hours in the Chapel of the Rhode Island Veterans Home, on Wednesday March 11, 2020 from 9:30 am -10:00 am .

Arrangements by the SMITH FUNERAL and MEMORIAL SERVICES , 8 Schoolhouse Road, Warren.

www.wjsmithfh.com
